CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many stages are there in this funnel chart?

SRP.Q: Is the Book Transport Service stage positioned above or below the Prepare for Pickup stage?
SRP.A: The Book Transport Service stage is positioned {above} the Prepare for Pickup stage.

VPR.Q: What pattern does the data reduction follow in this funnel chart?
VPR.A: The data reduction follows a {logarithmic} pattern.

VE.Q: What is the value of stage Prepare for Pickup?
VE.A: The value of stage Prepare for Pickup is {883}.

VE.Q: What is the value of stage Begin Transportation?
VE.A: The value of stage Begin Transportation is {517}.

EVJ.Q: What is the maximum value in the funnel chart?
EVJ.A: The stage with the highest value is Select Carrier or Service, with a value of {2285}.

EVJ.Q: What is the minimum value in the funnel chart?
EVJ.A: The stage with the lowest value is Provide Feedback or Rating, with a value of {290}.

SC.Q: How much did it decrease from stage Complete Delivery to stage Provide Feedback or Rating?
SC.A: Decreased by {55} Thousand Shipments from stage Complete Delivery to stage Provide Feedback or Rating.

SC.Q: How much did it decrease from stage Book Transport Service to stage Prepare for Pickup?
SC.A: Decreased by {518} Thousand Shipments from stage Book Transport Service to stage Prepare for Pickup.

NF.Q: In which stages of the funnel chart does the value exceed 700? Please list the stage labels and corresponding values.
NF.A: The {Select Carrier or Service} stage has {2285}, the {Book Transport Service} stage has {1401}, the {Prepare for Pickup} stage has {883}.

NF.Q: In which stages of the funnel chart does the value fall below 431? Please list the stage labels and corresponding values.
NF.A: The {Complete Delivery} stage has {345}, the {Provide Feedback or Rating} stage has {290}.

NF.Q: In which stages of the funnel chart does the value fall between 431 and 700? Please list the stage labels and corresponding values.

NC.Q: Which reduction is greater: from stage Complete Delivery to Provide Feedback or Rating, or from stage Prepare for Pickup to Begin Transportation?
NC.A: The reduction from stage {Prepare for Pickup} to {Begin Transportation} is greater.

NC.Q: Which reduction is the greatest: from stage Complete Delivery to Provide Feedback or Rating, from stage Book Transport Service to Prepare for Pickup, or from stage Prepare for Pickup to Begin Transportation?
NC.A: The reduction from stage {Book Transport Service} to stage {Prepare for Pickup} is the greatest.

MSR.Q: Between which two consecutive stages in the funnel chart is the conversion rate drop the largest?
MSR.A: The largest drop in conversion rate occurs between the {Select Carrier or Service} and {Book Transport Service} stages.

MSR.Q: Between which two consecutive stages in the funnel chart is the conversion rate drop the smallest?
MSR.A: The smallest drop in conversion rate occurs between the {Complete Delivery} and {Provide Feedback or Rating} stages.
